{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3150591,"name":"Josh Smith","username":"Mr.MetalSmith","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/a9a28c/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-02-22T16:46:02.187Z","cooked":"

We’re looking to make a extension wire for a neo 55 encoder using the jst connector. We don’t have any 24 awg wire but have access to the sizes below and above. Would this cause any operational issue with the signal sent over the wire?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2023-02-22T16:46:02.187Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":42,"reads":93,"readers_count":92,"score":228.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":427719,"topic_slug":"jst-encoder-extender-for-neo-55","display_username":"Josh Smith","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":40183,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/jst-encoder-extender-for-neo-55/427719/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3150593,"name":"Chris_Elston","username":"Chris_Elston","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/chris_elston/{size}/256883_2.png","created_at":"2023-02-22T16:47:17.755Z","cooked":"

Will these work?

REV Robotics

JST PH 6-pin Extension Cable - 4 Pack

REV Robotics designs, builds and manufactures robotics parts and components used by students for learning about science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM). Our parts are commonly used within the FIRST Robotics Competition and the FIRST Tech...

Price: USD 16

andymark.com

JST-PH 6-pin Extension Cable Qty. 4

Looking for just a little bit more length? This cable helps reach sensors without any cutting and splicing. Use with the JST-PH 6-pin Extension Cable Qty. 4 to get an even longer cable.

We’re looking at making a length longer than those. we’re trying to avoid have a mal to male adapter in an engergy chain

Might not be an option so close to competition now (not sure when your 1st event is), but we ended up making these boards to extend our absolute encoders this year (the thought being cat5/6 cable would help prevent excess noise in the encoder signal). So far they seem to be working quite well!

20230213_1944391920×1440 139 KB

We ordered the boards from JLCPCB (took about a week from order to recieve in hand), and the connectors from Digikey.
